message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I'm still interested in the product, but $120 is a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to go down to $100?
